summary: This is an FAA aircraft registration statement for Hyperion Air, LLC, a limited liability company organized in the US Virgin Islands. The document identifies Jeffrey E. Epstein as the sole member and Lawrence Visoski as the sole manager, both U.S. citizens, establishing the company's eligibility to register aircraft.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.role: Sole Member of Hyperion Air, LLC
persons.context: Identified as the sole member and a U.S. citizen individual owner of the aircraft-registering company Hyperion Air, LLC.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.role: Sole Manager of Hyperion Air, LLC
persons.context: Identified as the sole manager and a U.S. citizen individual responsible for managing the aircraft-registering company Hyperion Air, LLC.

connections.description: Epstein is the sole member (owner) of Hyperion Air, LLC, and Visoski is the sole manager of the company, indicating a business management relationship.

events.title: Formation of Hyperion Air, LLC
events.description: Hyperion Air, LLC was lawfully organized as a limited liability company in the United States Virgin Islands.

events.title: FAA Aircraft Registration Filing
events.description: The LLC Statement in Support of Registration for Hyperion Air, LLC was filed with the FAA Aircraft Registry in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.

locations: United States Virgin Islands (jurisdiction where Hyperion Air, LLC is organized)
Oklahoma City, Oklahoma (location of FAA Aircraft Registry where document was filed)
keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein was the sole member (owner) of Hyperion Air, LLC, a company used to register aircraft.
Lawrence Visoski was the sole manager of Hyperion Air, LLC, responsible for its operations.
Hyperion Air, LLC was organized in the United States Virgin Islands in October 2012.
The company's FAA registration was filed on August 13, 2013, certifying U.S. citizen ownership for aircraft registration purposes.
The document establishes a corporate structure linking Epstein to aircraft ownership through a Virgin Islands LLC.
